thread.title: Chris Brown & Former Flame Karrueche Drag Out Soulja Boy Beef On Instagram
thread.title_full: Chris Brown & Former Flame Karrueche Drag Out Soulja Boy Beef On Instagram

author: Kyle Eustice
title: Chris Brown & Former Flame Karrueche Drag Out Soulja Boy Beef On Instagram
text:
6 
The GRAM – After getting caught up in an Instagram war with Soulja Boy on Monday (January 2), R&B’s resident bad boy Chris Brown is now going at it with his former lover Karrueche Tran. Soulja commented with heart emojis on one of Tran’s Instagram photos , which ignited the feud in the first place. 
To make matters more complicated, now the woman at the center of the entire controversy is chiming in via Instagram as well. “This isn’t cool or funny,” Tran wrote in response to one of Brown’s comments. “It’s draining not just for me but for everyone. There’s so much more out there in life then ‘Twitter beefs.’ But anyways.. second off.. trying. to. make. me. feel. poppin? You talking about your old song ‘Poppin’? You know what makes me feel poppin? Getting up and going to set.. walking in my apartment and seeing my Emmy with my name on it.. giving away shoes and feeding the less fortunate.. being able to provide for my family with my own $$.. that’s what makes me feel good about myself.” A photo posted by Baller Alert (@balleralert) on Jan 3, 2017 at 9:07am PST 
Spoken like the true gentleman he apparently isn’t, Brown fired back, saying he wasn’t looking for the Emmy Award-winning actress and model’s opinion on the situation. He says that she wouldn’t even be relevant if he hadn’t put her name in headlines after claiming he wanted her back last month. A photo posted by Baller Alert (@balleralert) on Jan 3, 2017 at 9:42am PST 
He also continued posting photos aimed at Soulja and called him a snitch. Check out those posts below as the drama continues to unfold online. A photo posted by 1 YOU ❤️ 2 HATE (@chrisbrownofficial) on Jan 3, 2017 at 1:27pm PST A photo posted by 1 YOU ❤️ 2 HATE (@chrisbrownofficial) on Jan 3, 2017 at 1:32pm PST A photo posted by 1 YOU ❤️ 2 HATE (@chrisbrownofficial) on Jan 3, 2017 at 1:38pm PST A photo posted by 1 YOU ❤️ 2 HATE (@chrisbrownofficial) on Jan 3, 2017 at 1:12pm PST A video posted by 1 YOU ❤️ 2 HATE (@chrisbrownofficial) on Jan 3, 2017 at 2:29pm PST A photo posted by 1 YOU ❤️ 2 HATE (@chrisbrownofficial) on Jan 3, 2017 at 4:12pm PST Subscribe to DX Newsletter Get The Most Important Stories Of The Day Straight To Your Inbox Thank You!
